QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: surveyInAccuracyLimit
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDescription: The minimum accuracy value that Survey-In must achieve before it can complete.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: surveyInMinObservationDuration
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDescription: Defines the minimum amount of observation time for the position calculation.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: useTCP
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDescription: Use TCP to connect to RTK

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: useFixedBasePosition
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDescription: Specify the values for the RTK base position without having to do a survey in.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: fixedBasePositionLatitude
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDescription: Defines the latitude of the fixed RTK base position.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: fixedBasePositionLongitude
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDescription: Defines the longitude of the fixed RTK base position.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: fixedBasePositionAltitude
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDescription: Defines the altitude of the fixed RTK base position.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: fixedBasePositionAccuracy
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDescription: Defines the accuracy of the fixed RTK base position.
